minor.comment: Add a `Sort.sortKeys` function for sorting keys in an object
Rename `LockFile.acquire` to `Lockfile.acquireAsync`.

patch.comment: Fix an issue where attempting to acquire multiple `LockFile`s at the same time on POSIX would cause the second to immediately be acquired without releasing the first.

minor.comment: Add a `customFormats` option to `JsonSchema`.
Introduce a `Text.splitByNewLines` function.

Add a `ignoreSchemaField` option to the `JsonSchema.validateObject` options to ignore `$schema` properties and add an options object argument to `JsonSchema.validateObjectWithCallback` with the same `ignoreSchemaField` option.

patch.comment: Include CHANGELOG.md in published releases again

minor.comment: Add support for the `jsonSyntax` option to the `JsonFile.save`, `JsonFile.saveAsync`, and `JsonFile.stringify` functions.

patch.comment: Include missing `type` modifiers on type-only exports.

minor.comment: Add a `throwOnSignal` option to the `Executable.waitForExitAsync` to control if that function should throw if the process is terminated with a signal.
Add a `signal` property to the result of `Executable.waitForExitAsync` that includes a signal if the process was termianted by a signal.
Include typings for the the `"files"` field in `IPackageJson`.
Include typings for the `"exports"` and `"typesVersions"` fields in `IPackageJson`.
Update `JsonFile` to support loading JSON files that include object keys that are members of `Object.prototype`.

patch.comment: Fix an issue with `JsonSchema` where `"uniqueItems": true` would throw an error if the `"item"` type in the schema has `"type": "object"`.

major.comment: Replace z-schema with ajv for schema validation and add support for json-schema draft-07.
Convert `FileConstants` and `FolderConstants` from enums to const objects.

patch.comment: Fix an issue where waitForExitAsync() might reject before all output was collected

minor.comment: Rename `Async.sleep` to `Async.sleepAsync`. The old function is marked as `@deprecated`.

patch.comment: Fix a bug in `Async.forEachAsync` where weight wasn't respected.

minor.comment: Add a new `weighted: true` option to the `Async.forEachAsync` method that allows each element to specify how much of the allowed parallelism the callback uses.

patch.comment: Add a new `weighted: true` option to the `Async.mapAsync` method that allows each element to specify how much of the allowed parallelism the callback uses.

minor.comment: Add `writeBuffersToFile` and `writeBuffersToFileAsync` methods to `FileSystem` for efficient writing of concatenated files.

patch.comment: Replace the dependency on the `colors` package with `Colorize` from `@rushstack/terminal`.
Remove a no longer needed dependency on the `colors` package

major.comment: (BREAKING CHANGE) Remove the Terminal and related APIs (Colors, AsciEscape, etc). These have been moved into the @rushstack/terminal package. See https://github.com/microsoft/rushstack/pull/3176 for details.

minor.comment: Graduate `Async` and `MinimumHeap` APIs from beta to public.

patch.comment: Fix broken link to API documentation
LockFile: prevent accidentaly deleting freshly created lockfile when multiple processes try to acquire the same lock on macOS/Linux

minor.comment: Add getStatistics() method to FileWriter instances
Inclue a `Text.reverse` API for reversing a string.

patch.comment: Improve 'bin' definition in `IPackageJson` type
Fix Executable.getProcessInfoBy* methods truncating the process name on MacOS

minor.comment: Add the `dependenciesMeta` property to the `INodePackageJson` interface.
Updates the `JsonFile` API to format JSON as JSON5 if an existing string is being updated to preserve the style of the existing JSON.
Add functions inside the `Executable` API to list all process trees (`getProcessInfoById`, `getProcessInfoByIdAsync`, `getProcessInfoByName`, and `getProcessInfoByNameAsync`).
Add functions inside the `Text` API to split iterables (or async iterables) that produce strings or buffers on newlines (`readLinesFromIterable` and `readLinesFromIterableAsync`).
Add the `waitForExitAsync` method inside the `Executable` API used to wait for a provided child process to exit.
Add Async.getSignal for promise-based signaling. Add MinimumHeap for use as a priority queue.

patch.comment: Update type-only imports to include the type modifier.

minor.comment: Update @types/node from 14 to 18

none.comment: Update error messages when modules or packages cannot be found using the "Import.resolve*" methods.

patch.comment: Updated semver dependency
Fix Import.resolveModule* and Import.resolvePackage* methods to return real-paths when resolving self-referencing specs
Remove extraneous string encode/decode of final output during `JsonFile.save`/`JsonFile.saveAsync`.

minor.comment: Add an option to the `PrefixProxyTerminalProvider` to create a dynamic prefix, which can be used for something like prefixing logging lines with a timestamp.
Expose a `Text.escapeRegExp` function to escape regexp special characters.
Add PrefixProxyTerminalProvider to allow for prefixing a provided string before writing to a terminal provider
Add a Writable stream adapter for ITerminal to allow writing to a terminal as a stream
Adds the AsyncQueue class, a queue type that allows for iterating and concurrently adding to the queue
Adds support for async Import.resolve* APIs

patch.comment: Fix a typings issue in FileSystem.copyFilesAsync
Fix issues with Import.resolve* APIs when attempting to resolve system modules paths (ex. 'fs/promises') and self-referencing module paths
Change the peer dependency selector on `@types/node` to a wildcard (`*`).

minor.comment: Bump @types/node peerDependency to ^14.18.36.
Add a `peerDependenciesMeta` property to `IPackageJson`.
Move the @types/node dependency to an optional peerDependency.

patch.comment: Improve performance of `Import.resolvePackage`.
Improve the error message emitted when a path inside a package is passed to `Import.resolvePackage`.

Fix a bug where `Sort.isSorted` and `Sort.isSortedBy` unexpectedly compared the first element against `undefined`. Optimize `Sort.sortMapKeys` to run the check for already being sorted against the original Map instead of a derived array.

minor.comment: Add a Path.convertToPlatformDefault API to convert a path to use the platform-default slashes.
Add a "FileSystem.isNotDirectoryError" function that returns `true` if the passed-in error object is an ENOTDIR error.
Add a parameter to the `LockFile.release` function to optionally delete the lockfile.

patch.comment: Introduce JsonSyntax option for JsonFile.load() and related APIs

minor.comment: Deprecate LegacyAdapters.sortStable and remove support for NodeJS < 11. If you are using NodeJS < 11, this is a breaking change.

patch.comment: Update `PackageJsonLookup` to only resolve to `package.json` files that contain a `"name"` field. See GitHub issue #2070

minor.comment: Add an Async.runWithRetriesAsync() API to run and a retry an async function that may intermittently fail.
Add SubprocessTerminator utility, which can be used to kill a process and all of its child processes on demand or on termination of the host process.

Add FileSystem.isDirectoryError utility function to determine if an error has the code "EISDIR". This error code may be returned (for example) when attempting to delete a folder as if it were a file using the FileSystem.deleteFile API.
Add a "trimLeadingDotSlash" option to the Path.formatConcisely function to not include the leading "./" in paths under the baseFolder.
Change the FileError relative path output to not include the leading "./"
Add FileError class. This error type can be thrown when encountering an error at a specific line and column of a target file.

patch.comment: Fix a race condition affecting the LockFile API on the Linux operating system
Fix and issue where Async.forEachAsync with an async iterator can overflow the max concurrency
Rename the "master" branch to "main".

minor.comment: Expose a FileSystem.readFolderItems and FileSystem.readFolderItemsAsync API to get folder entries with types in a single API call.
Deprecate FileSystem.readFolder in favor of FileSystem.readFolderItemNames.

patch.comment: Update z-schema to ~5.0.2.

minor.comment: Replace const enums with conventional enums to allow for compatability with JavaScript consumers.

patch.comment: Updated Path.convertToSlashes() to use replace(/\\/g, '/') instead of split/join for better performance.
Update the package.json repository field to include the directory property.

minor.comment: Add more elaborate "repository" field types in IPackageJson.

patch.comment: Fix an issue where Async.foreEachAsync can never resolve when operating on a large array.

minor.comment: Expose an ITerminal interface.
Allow Async.mapAsync and Async.forEachAsync to take an iterator.

patch.comment: Upgrade the `@types/node` dependency to version to version 12.
Improve documentation to clarify usage for FileSystem APIs related to symbolic links
Add support for AlreadyExistsBehavior in symlink and junction scenarios

minor.comment: Add new Terminal message severity "debug", below verbose.
BREAKING CHANGE: Remove FileSystem.copyFileToManyAsync API. It was determined that this API was a likely source of 0-length file copies. Recommended replacement is to call copyFileAsync.
Add `ignoreUndefinedValues` option to JsonFile to discard keys with undefined values during serialization; this is the standard behavior of `JSON.stringify()` and other JSON serializers.
Add a new API "Async" with some utilities for working with promises
Add EnvironmentMap API
Add Executable.spawn() API
Add new "copyFileToMany" API to copy a single file to multiple locations
Add an alreadyExistsBehavior option to the options for creating links in FileSystem.

patch.comment: Fix an issue where the TextAttribute.Bold ANSI escape was not rendered correctly by Linux
Update to build with @rushstack/heft-node-rig

minor.comment: Add Path.isEqual(), Path.formatConcisely(), Path.convertToSlashes(), Path.convertToBackslashes(), and Path.isDownwardRelative()
Upgrade compiler; the API now requires TypeScript 3.9 or newer

patch.comment: Update README.md

minor.comment: Add a missing "existsAsync" function to the FileSystem API.
Add Text.getNewline() and FileWriter.filePath
Add Brand API
Replace Colors.normalizeColorTokensForTest() (which was marked as "beta") with AnsiEscape.formatForTests()
Include an API for resolving packages and modules.
Introduce a "JsonNull" type for describing legacy JSON structures without triggering the "@rushstack/no-new-null" lint rule
Add a utility function for making console color codes human-readable.
Create a lighter weight function to get own package version.

patch.comment: Lazy-import some packages to improve spin up times.

minor.comment: Add new APIs AlreadyReportedError and TypeUuid

patch.comment: Updated project to build with Heft
Triggering publish of dependents

minor.comment: Added IJsonFileStringifyOptions.headerComment
Add a utility method to convert a map into an object

patch.comment: Improve API docs for "LockFile"

minor.comment: Add a FileSystem.copyFiles() API for recursively copying folders, and clarify that FileSystem.copyFile() only copies a single file

patch.comment: Improve async callstacks for FileSystem API (when using Node 12)

minor.comment: Add an "FileSystemStats" alias to avoid the need to import "fs" when using the FileSystem API
Add FileSystem.readLink() and readLinkAsync()

patch.comment: Make not-exist error messages more readable.

minor.comment: Expose string parsing APIs from JsonFile.
Create async versions of FileSystem and JsonFile APIs.
Add PackageNameParser class, which is a configurable version of the PackageName API

patch.comment: Upgrade cyclic dependencies
PACKAGE NAME CHANGE: The NPM scope was changed from `@microsoft/node-core-library` to `@rushstack/node-core-library`
Fix a typing issue that prevented LegacyAdapters from being used with the new glob typings.
Fix an issue with a missing type in LegacyAdapters

minor.comment: Upgrade Node typings to Node 10
Add NewlineKind.OsDefault and fix some comments
Add new API LegacyAdapters.stableSort(), and update the Sort API to be stable

patch.comment: Refactor some code as part of migration from TSLint to ESLint

minor.comment: Add JsonObject type

patch.comment: Update repository URL

minor.comment: Upgrade @types/node dependency and remove unnecessary dependencies on @types/fs-extra, @types/jju, and @types/z-schema

patch.comment: Update documentation
Add support for two more arguments in LegacyAdapters.convertCallbackToPromise.

minor.comment: Remove experimental IPackageJsonTsdocConfiguration API, since the "tsdocFlavor" field is no longer used by API Extractor
Introduce an interface INodePackageJson for loading package.json files whose "version" field may be missing.
Add two new APIs PackageJsonLookup.loadNodePackageJson() and tryLoadNodePackageJsonFor() that return INodePackageJson

patch.comment: Export ColorValue and TextAttribute to eliminate the ae-forgotten-export warning

minor.comment: Treat `types` as an alias for `typings` in package.json

patch.comment: Include an enum that had been missing from the exports.

minor.comment: Exposing field tsdocMetadata in package.json
Include support for text formatting in the Terminal API.
Add new API `InternalError.breakInDebugger`

patch.comment: Exposing utility class StringBufferTerminalProvider, useful to clients of Terminal API for their own unit tests

minor.comment: Remove deprecated FileDiffTest API for unit tests; please use Jest snapshots instead

patch.comment: Add missing space in error message
Use @types/jju not custom typings
Clarify error message reported by JsonFile._validateNoUndefinedMembers()

minor.comment: Added a new "InternalError" API for reporting software defects

patch.comment: Improve Sort.compareByValue() to consistently order "null" and "undefined" values

minor.comment: Add new API PackageJsonLookup.loadOwnPackageJson()
Add new APIs Sort.sortSet() and Sort.sortSetBy()

patch.comment: Upgrade fs-extra to eliminate the "ERROR: ENOTEMPTY: directory not empty, rmdir" error that sometimes occurred with FileSystem.deleteFolder()
Remove all dependencies on the "rimraf" library

minor.comment: Add Sort API
Adding Terminal API.

patch.comment: Remove use of a deprecated Buffer API.

minor.comment: Renaming PromiseUtilities to LegacyAdapters
Introduce promiseify utility function.

patch.comment: Update documentation

minor.comment: Add `Path.isUnderOrEquals()`

patch.comment: Update "repository" field in package.json

major.comment: (Breaking API change) The FileSystem move/copy/createLink operations now require the source/target parameters to be explicitly specified, to avoid confusion

patch.comment: Republish all packages in web-build-tools to resolve GitHub issue #782

minor.comment: Add features to JsonFile API to update an existing JSON file while preserving comments and whitespace

patch.comment: Fix an issue where Executable.spawnSync() was returning SpawnSyncReturns<Buffer> instead of SpawnSyncReturns<string>
Fix an issue where Executable.spawnSync() did not support command paths containing spaces

minor.comment: Add a new API "Executable" for spawning child processes

major.comment: Replace IFileModeBits with a more flexible PosixModeBits enum

minor.comment: Add new APIs FileSystem.getPosixModeBits() and FileSystem.formatPosixModeBits()
Add a FileSystem API that wraps and replaces fs and fs-extra

patch.comment: issue #705: fallback on linux to /proc/{n}/stat if 'ps -p 1 -o lstart' is not supported

minor.comment: Add Text.truncateWithEllipsis() API

patch.comment: Add missing "repository" property in IPackageJSON.
Fix an issue where the PackageName class could not parse the package name "Base64"

minor.comment: Update the package resolution logic to preserve symlinks in paths
Add a new API "MapExtensions.mergeFromMap"
Add new API "PackageName" for validating package names and extracting scopes
Add new API "ProtectableMap" for tracking/restricting how a map is consumed

patch.comment: Add "tsdoc" field to the IPackageJson API
Improve PackageJsonLookup.tryGetPackageFolderFor() to deduplicate symlinks by using fs.realpathSync()

major.comment: Redesign the PackageJsonLookup API. This is a breaking change.

minor.comment: Add new APIs IPackageJson, FileConstants, and FolderConstants
Add new Text API

patch.comment: Fix an issue where the LockFile was unable to acquire the lock if the resource dir doesn't exist.

minor.comment: Add "Path.isUnder()" API

patch.comment: Fix an issue for LockFiles where not all filesystem operations were wrapped in a try/catch block.

minor.comment: Add an API to `LockFile` which allows the caller to asyncronously wait for a LockFile to become available.
Add a LockFile class to work with LockFile's that manage resources across multiple processes.

patch.comment: Force a patch bump in case the previous version was an empty package
Enable package typings generated by api-extractor

minor.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade to Node 8

patch.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Get web-build-tools building with pnpm

patch.author: QZ <qz2017@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: lock the reference version between web build tools projects

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Upgrade cyclic dependencies

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Updated cyclic dependencies

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: When FileDiffTest creates a copy of the expected output for comparison, it is now marked as read-only to avoid confusion

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: FileDiffTest now copies the expected file into the same folder as the actual file for easier comparisons

minor.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade to es6

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Improve error reporting for JsonFile.validateNoUndefinedMembers()

patch.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Deprecate @types/es6-coll ections in favor of built-in typescript typings 'es2015.collection' a nd 'es2015.iterable'

minor.comment: Initial implementation of DiffTest, JsonFile, and PackageJsonLookup
